contract_title: Web Interface Enhancement & User Experience Optimization

contract_details.description: Enhance web interfaces and user experience following repository cleanup. Focus on dashboard improvements, visualization optimization, and user interaction enhancements.
contract_details.background: With the repository now optimized (2,183 files, 296 directories), Agent-7 can focus on improving web interfaces and user experience to better reflect the cleaned, organized system.
objectives: Audit and enhance existing web dashboards and interfaces
Improve data visualization and user interaction patterns
Optimize web interface performance and responsiveness
Implement modern UI/UX best practices for agent coordination
Create intuitive navigation and information architecture
deliverables: Enhanced monitoring dashboard with real-time swarm status
Improved data visualization for agent performance metrics
Optimized web interface performance and responsiveness
Modern UI/UX implementation with accessibility compliance
Comprehensive user experience documentation and guidelines
success_criteria: Web interfaces load in <2 seconds with 2183+ file support
Dashboard provides real-time swarm coordination visibility
Data visualizations are intuitive and actionable

contract_history.details: New contract created for Agent-7 web interface enhancement post-cleanup
